original_title: 新奴隷捜査官9 マニアの標的
overview: I want to make a woman as much as I want. However, she is boring as a weak woman from the beginning. A masculine woman is caught by a villainous trap, trained while being covered with humiliation, and finally becomes a poor sex slave ● and bows down to serve me. I want that kind of situation, right? ...... A woman who Kirisaki, a trainer who received a request from a maniac, took her eyes. That was Sakura Hojo, a completely invincible elite investigator.
title: Shinho Investigator 9. Target of maniacs
